text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    EmCare.B17.DE46YesThe client has received all vaccinations for age
    EmCare.B17.DE47No, incomplete vaccinationThe client has not received all vaccinations for age
    EmCare.B17.DE48No, the child has never received any vaccinations to dateThe client has never received any vaccinations to date
    EmCare.B17.DE49UnknownIt is not known if the client has received any vaccination

name: valueset-child-vaccination-status
title: EmCare.B17.DE45
description: Check the child's vaccination record: has the child received all vaccines they are eligible for

designation.value: The client has received all vaccinations for age
The client has not received all vaccinations for age

concept.display: No, the child has never received any vaccinations to date

designation.value: The client has never received any vaccinations to date
It is not known if the client has received any vaccination
